meaningMnemonic: There's an <radical>explosion</radical> in the <radical>dirt</radical> under a <radical>rice paddy</radical>, exposing the hidden <kanji>base</kanji> under there. A base from baseball! I guess this rice paddy was built on top of an old baseball field...
readingMnemonic: Unfortunately, thanks to the explosion, the <kanji>base</kanji> is in <reading>rui</reading>ns (るい). It's dark and smokey and kinda half burned. You probably can't get this in a regulation game.
